mapper.select: SELECT TOP 1 css_config.config_id, css_config.plc_ip, css_config.plc_port, css_config.one_one_length, css_config.two_length, css_config.judge_load_point, css_config.pointj_length, css_config.pointk_length, css_config.pointl_length, css_config.speed_one, css_config.speed_two, css_config.new_delay_point_time, css_config.length_one, css_config.length_two, css_config.pointl_length, css_config.language_set FROM dbo.css_config
